review_text:
Course description says "Intermediate", but the content provided is below beginner. Quiz questions are just there for the sake of being there since they have nothing to do with Kali.

Content of the course is just basics of how Linux Command Line works. Course being called "Kali Linux" feels like a cheap scam to grab peoples attention since it covers nothing specific to Kali
name: By Kyvan E

review_text: I think the course should cover Kali Linux in more detail, but this course seems to only provide a general overview, making it feel more suited for beginners. If you're new to Kali Linux and want a basic understanding of its processes, this course is great for you. Otherwise, I wouldn't recommend attending the class.
